title: Mrs. Winston's Green Grocery - Colorado Blvd
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small natural foods and snacks store with a large salad bar featuring many vegetarian & vegan choices and lots of sprouts. Build your own salad and sandwich. Shared outdoor garden seating with view of water pond. Directions: location is inside The Water Garden business complex, and parking is provided underground for a fee.
